name: Old man
Text: If you wish to enter, youâ€™ll have to wait.

name: Old man
Text: The door is jammed. I'm trying to unlock it.

name: Old man
Text: There are a lot of fissures and holes on the ground.

name: Old man
Text: So you can wait, or you could use that hole over there.

name: Old man
Text: No idea where it leads, though.
